page.title: 19My Christmas - by Jane 8yrs
page.content: I woke up at 3 o'clock and my cousin came to sleep.When we went downstairs I saw a present on the table and it said on it "To Jane from Father Christmas". Jeannette said that I could open it before breakfast.It was lucky charms. After breakfast we opened our presents from under the tree.My best present was a guinea pig from Lisa.My sister got a guinea pig too.I got a Crystal Barbie doll from my Granny and Grandad. My mum and dad gave me a teddy bear and my sister gave me a mirror with "Jane's Room" on in silver.I got a horse for my Sindy doll from my Great Granny.My mum and dad gave my sister and me Monopoly and the Dickens game.For dinner we had roast potatoes,turkey,sausages and bacon.For pudding we had Christmas pudding,jelly and ice cream.In the afternoon we went for a walk and (cont. on p.20)
